requirements.summary: Retry deployment to Internet Computer without modifying any code
acceptanceCriteria: All canisters are deployed and running on the Internet Computer
The application is accessible via its canister URL

file_operations.description: Verify deployment configuration is correct. This is a verification-only operation - do not change any code, dependencies, or scripts. Ensure all build and deployment scripts reference the correct canister IDs and network settings. If everything is correct, no changes should be made.
